document.full_text: either way you look at it, this michigan city is on the front line -- either it is a harbinger of battles to come over budget cuts across america or a new chapter in the struggle for civil rights.
document.title: michigan town's woes a sign of tough choices to come
lines_and_colors: either way you look at it, this michigan city is on the front line -- either it is a harbinger of battles to come over budget cuts across america or a new chapter in the struggle for civil rights.
